fr.zimzim.game

Class PuyoGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zimzim.game.PuyoGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGame, java.lang.Runnable

    public class PuyoGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGame, java.lang.Runnable
    Game controler, holds all engines and define the main loop of the game
    Author:
    Simon Jambu
